description: Suzhou; white porcelain; two handles opposite each other, extending from rim to shoulder; rounded shoulders tapering to double ringed waist and flaring slightly at foot; has storage box (L1.1 MS)
medium: Tz'u-chou (Cizhou) type ware Stoneware with white slip under a clear glaze
object_name: Bottle jar, one of a pair
text: These tall, waisted minimally decorated vessels are unusually elegant for Cizhou type ware. Their visual impact derives from their well-ordered formality that differs considerably from the energetically painted and cut-glaze Cizhou decoration displayed here.
title: Bottle jar, one of a pair
